mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.pro_no as proNo , t.mobile as mobile , t.msg_id as msgId , t.third_msg_id as thirdMsgId , t.temp_no as tempNo , t.content as content , t.status as status , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.send_status as sendStatus , t.create_time as createTime , t.create_by as createBy , t.update_time as updateTime , t.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_sms_log
id,
pro_no,
mobile,
msg_id,
third_msg_id,
temp_no,
content,
status,
tenant_id,
send_status,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
remark,
#{id},
#{proNo},
#{mobile},
#{msgId},
#{thirdMsgId
#{tempNo},
#{content},
#{status},
#{tenantId},
#{sendStatus},
#{createTime},
#{createBy},
#{updateTime},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
update t_sys_sms_log
pro_no = #{proNo},
mobile = #{mobile},
msg_id = #{msgId},
third_msg_id = #{thirdMsgId
temp_no = #{tempNo},
content = #{content},
status = #{status},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
send_status = #{sendStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_sys_sms_log t where t.id=#{id}
select from t_sys_sms_log t where t.msg_id = #{msgId}
